run.Description: Which run this timing segment corresponds to

trial_type.Description: What type of event is occuring at this moment during the task

Levels.sweet: 0.5mL of 0.6M sucrose is delivered 4x, once every 4 seconds. Participants prompted to swallow 2sec after taste delivery
Levels.sour: 0.5mL of 0.01M Citric Acid is delivered 4x, once every 4 seconds. Participants prompted to swallow 2sec after taste delivery
Levels.salty: 0.5mL of 0.20M NaCl is delivered 4x, once every 4 seconds. Participants prompted to swallow 2sec after taste delivery
Levels.neutral: 0.5mL of tasteless solution (2.5mM NaHCO3 + 25mM KCl) is delivered 4x, once every 4 seconds. Participants prompted to swallow 2sec after taste delivery
Levels.wash: 1.0mL of tasteless solution (2.5mM NaHCO3 + 25mM KCl) is delivered as a wash. Participants prompted to swallow 2sec after wash delivery
